title: OADA File Metadata Schema
description: System defined and optional platform defined metadata associated with a file stored in the grower's datastore

path.description: Absolute path to file in the grower datastore.

rev.description: The revision of the file to retrieve. File version naming schema is left to the provider.

created_date.description: Date that the file was created.

modified_date.description: Date that the file was modified last.

data_type.description: The precision ag operation or task that was undertaken that represents the data stored in the file.
